RelatedSentence: Posted on May 19 , 2014 at 6:03 a.m. Power was restored shortly after noon , Indiana Michigan Power Co. spokesman Brian Bergsma said , but crews stayed on to monitor the restored power lines to make sure there were no lingering issues .

Figures released Friday , May 16 , show Elkhart County unemployment at 5 percent in April , a number that has n't been that low since February 2007 .
But in many ways , we 're still relying on the same economy that peaked at 20.2 percent unemployment in March 2009 .
